Class DefaultEditorComponent

                          +--com.milk.objed.gui.DefaultEditorComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, EditorComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class DefaultEditorComponent
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements EditorComponent

This is the default, and mostly non-functional, component for interacting with editors that don't have any special class for them.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
Serialized Form
